formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Bucket Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the Bucket to create

formElement.label: Key:
formElement.documentation: Key of the object to upload. This value will be used as the key for the object that is uploaded

formElement.label: File to Upload:
formElement.documentation: Path for file to upload. For example, '/path/to/fileToUpload.txt' or 'C:\mydir\fileToUpload.txt'.

formElement.label: Make the object public:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the uploaded object will be publicly accessible

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: Where to put the result. If not specified, the result is pushed to /myJob.
